alert.note: Alert for Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 3:09PM EST until December 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Rhode Island...Massachusetts... Blackstone River At Woonsocket affecting Providence and Worcester Counties. For the Blackstone River...including Woonsocket...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Blackstone River at Woonsocket. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Floodwaters are inside the lower level of the 148 Bernon St. Condominiums in Woonsocket. Flooding spreads across most of the lower parking area of the Highland Falls Apartments. Flooding is also expected to overspread lowest lying sections of Lonsdale in Cumberland. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM EST Monday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 11.3 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.1 feet on 04/17/2007. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 315 AM EST.
